name: The Quaddle Family Mysteries: Quaddle 2
overview: The second game in The Quaddle Family Mysteries series of educational video games. Your child is invited inside the fascinating Quaddle museum to help investigate the case of the missing scarab earring. Solving mathematical puzzles and problems in the museum's various rooms will provide clues to the earring's location. Features: - Apply measurement to problem-solving situations - Estimate by using monstandard units of length - Use a measurement tool to interpret information from a chart - Use units of measure to count or compute length, perimeter and area - Use a nonstandard unit of measure to calculate distance As with all Lightspan games, this title was not released to retail to the general public. Instead, it was only available to schools for educational purposes.
